description: Analyze images and videos by providing URLs or local file paths. Gain insights and detailed descriptions of image content using advanced AI models. Enhance your applications with high-precision image recognition and video analysis capabilities.

geminiApiKey.description: Your Google Gemini API key required for image analysis.

capabilities.name: analyze_image
capabilities.description: Receives one or more image URLs and analyzes the image contents using Flash 2.0. Can analyze relationships between multiple images.

capabilities.name: analyze_image_from_path
capabilities.description: Loads one or more images from local file paths and analyzes their contents using Flash 2.0. Can analyze relationships between multiple images. Provide valid paths for the server environment.

capabilities.name: analyze_video
capabilities.description: Downloads videos from URLs, analyzes content using Gemini 2.0 Flash. Best for small videos (<20MB). Can analyze multiple videos together.

capabilities.name: analyze_video_from_path
capabilities.description: Loads videos from local paths, analyzes content using Gemini 2.0 Flash. Best for small videos (<20MB). Can analyze multiple videos together.

capabilities.name: analyze_youtube_video
capabilities.description: Analyzes a video directly from a YouTube URL using Gemini 2.0 Flash.
